item.title: basic rgee - Consideration
item.description: Thanks to reticulate embedding a Python session within an R session, rgee and the Earth Engine Python API share the same modules, classes, functions, and methods. In other words, the logic of the syntax is the same and just as fast (just change . by a $). Notwithstanding, differences in the language design of R and Python might cause some problems in specific scenarios. We identify three bug-potential cases.
